long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My extension is a versatile tool that combines the functionality of a timer and stopwatch, allowing users to track time down to the second. Additionally, the extension includes quick links to the five most popular websites, enabling users to instantly navigate to their favorite web pages. Furthermore, the extension displays the current time and date, providing users with all the necessary time information right on their screen. This makes it an ideal tool for those who value their time and want to stay informed about everything important
